```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)
library(magrittr)
library(ggbiplot)
library(readr)
library(synapseClient)
library(doParallel)
synapseLogin()
```

Load up our data files.
```{r}
syn.cna <- synGet('syn7851245')
genie.cna <- read_tsv(syn.cna@filePath)
gdsc.genes <- read_tsv("gdsc.geneslist")
genie.genes <- select(genie.cna, HUGO_SYMBOL)
```

Here we find the intersection of the GDSC gene list and the GENIE gene list.
```{r}
intersection <- intersect(gdsc.genes, genie.genes) %>% arrange(HUGO_SYMBOL)
```
